title: Koi to Yobu ni wa Kimochi Warui (Koikimo)
synopsis: People fall in love in the most mysterious of ways. This statement seems to be especially true for the affluent genius playboy Ryou Amakusa. When he nearly falls off the stairs one rainy morning, a girl named Ichika Arima saves him. As if by fate, Ryou encounters Ichika again later that night; she happens to be the best friend of his little sister, Rio.
related_anime: ['Koi to Yobu ni wa Kimochi Warui']
voices: ['Toyonaga, Toshiyuki', 'Kozakai, Yurie', 'Hasegawa, Rena', 'Enoki, Junya', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Kimura, Ryouhei']
